overview:
Joseph founded and jointly funded Rubysophic in Feb. 2008 after serving as a Software Executive in IBM. He co-founded Cyanea Systems Corp. and was the CTO. He created the flagship product Cyanea/One V1 and V2, producing the first J2EE application performance diagnostic product in the market that runs across from mid-tier platforms to the mainframe platform, supporting WebSphere, Weblogic, CICS and IMS application servers. As a result, IBM, one of the initial investors of Cyanea eventually acquired Cyanea in 2.5 years.

Prior to Cyanea, Joseph was the CTO of B2SB.com specialized in building small business websites, VP of Engineering of PlanetRx.com, an online pharmacy with a distribution center, a Director in Charles Schwab responsible for the scaling up of its web based transaction tier during 1997 â€“ 1999 using parallel systems infrastructure coupled with data replication through messaging.

He has a Master degree in Computer Science, and 3 software patents.
